fit_data module¶

fit_data.LOOE_vector[source]¶

return the leave-one-out error vector.

fit_data.compute_kernel[source]¶
fit_data.compute_labels(x)[source]¶

normalize inputs to a [0, 1] hyperrectangle.

fit_data.fit_data(sims_dir, redshift_dir, param_files, kernel, output_emu_filename, obs_filename_ext, load_scalar=False)[source]¶

fit data with a linear least-squares model

fit_data.fit_data_with_kernel[source]¶

fit data with a least-squares model with kernel K, observations Y. If noise of observations is Gaussian, Lambda = 2*var(x).

fit_data.fit_hyperparameters(Y, X, Yerr, kernel='poly')[source]¶

fit the hyperparameters of the kernel function.

fit_data.load_correlation_file(filename)[source]¶
fit_data.load_scalar_file(filename)[source]¶
fit_data.matern32_kernel[source]¶

compute Matern-3/2 kernel.

fit_data.matern52_kernel[source]¶

compute Matern-5/2 kernel.

fit_data.model_data[source]¶
fit_data.poly2_kernel[source]¶
fit_data.poly2_matern32_kernel[source]¶
fit_data.poly3_kernel[source]¶
fit_data.poly4_kernel[source]¶
fit_data.poly5_kernel[source]¶
fit_data.poly6_kernel[source]¶
fit_data.polyharmonic_kernel[source]¶

compute polyharmonic (thin-plate spline) kernel.

fit_data.polynomial_kernel[source]¶
fit_data.read_data(sims_dir, redshift_dir, param_files, filename_ext=None, load_scalar=False)[source]¶

read parameters from *.template_param files, read in *.galaxy_bias files, read simulation /header files for cosmological params. return (matrix X of parameters, vector Y of observations) for each radial bin.

fit_data.spline_kernel[source]¶

compute cubic spline kernel from tensor product of scalar cubic splines. Parameters should be normalized to [0,1).

fit_data.sqrexp_kernel[source]¶

compute Squared Exponential kernel.

fit_data.sqrexp_matern32_kernel[source]¶

compute Squared Exponential + Matern-3/2 kernel.

fit_data.sqrexp_matern52_kernel[source]¶

compute Squared Exponential + Matern-5/2 kernel.
